description: Generate a vector data cube of points by sampling points from input geometries.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
Input geometries for sample extraction. Vector properties are preserved for vector data cubes and all GeoJSON Features.

To maximize interoperability, a nested `GeometryCollection` should be avoided. Furthermore, a `GeometryCollection` composed of a single type of geometries should be avoided in favour of the corresponding multi-part type (e.g. `MultiPolygon`).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of points to compute per geometry. Note that points in the input geometries can be selected at most once by the sampling.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description:
The method to distribute the samples:

* `random` (default): Random sampling
* `fibonacci`: Fibonacci spiral sampling

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: A randomization seed to use for random sampling. If not given or `null`, no seed is used and results may differ on subsequent use.

returns.description: Returns a vector data cube with the sampled points as `MultiPoint` per geometry given.
